ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml

Class XmlReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.Processor
      • ca.uqac.lif.cep.GroupProcessor
        • ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml.XmlReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.Contextualizable, Cloneable

    public class XmlReader
extends ca.uqac.lif.cep.GroupProcessor
    Splits an input stream into chunks of XML, and parses each chunk into an XmlElement
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©
